name: Bendy 2D: Low Budget Edition
description:
STORY:

WELCOME TO BENDY 2D: Low Budget Edition! Play As Henry As He Ventures Into The Cartoon Studio After Getting a Mysterious letter From His Old Friends, Joey Drew...

DISCLAMIER:

Credits to Joey Drew Studios for the original game NOT AN OFFICIAL BENDY AND THE INK MACHINE PRODUCT. NOT APPROVED BY OR ASSOCIATED WITH JOEY DREW STUDIOS INC. THIS PROJECT IS NON-PROFIT AND IS MADE FOR NO OTHER REASON THEN FOR FUN! the use of Batim Assets Is To signify its a bendy fangame and nothing else. Check Out The Original Game! It's Awesome!

IN-GAME CONTROLS:

+ W,S,A,D To Move Henry Throughout The Game!

+ Space To Proceed Thru Joey Drew Letter Screen!

+ Click To Interact With Audio Logs For Stories From Employees!

CREDITS:

+ Bendy & The Ink Machine Franchise By: Joey Drew Studios/ Kindly Beast

+ Bendy 2D Low Budget Edition By: @SunnehBoi   &    @Catster
